content.name: battery
content.description: (Applies to physical deployments only.) Information about batteries in the storage system.

attributes.name: parentStorageProcessor
attributes.description: Parent Storage Processor of the battery.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the battery instance.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the battery, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: vendorSerialNumber
attributes.description: Vendor serial number for the battery.

attributes.name: emcSerialNumber
attributes.description: EMC serial number for the battery.

attributes.name: needsReplacement
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the battery needs replacement. Values are:
  • true - Battery needs replacement.
  • false - Battery does not need replacement.

attributes.name: parent
attributes.description: Resource type and unique identifier of the battery's parent enclosure.

attributes.name: firmwareVersion
attributes.description: Firmware version number for the battery.

attributes.name: emcPartNumber
attributes.description: EMC part number for the battery.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Manufacturer's model number for the battery.

attributes.name: slotNumber
attributes.description: Slot number where the battery is located in the parent enclosure.

attributes.name: vendorPartNumber
attributes.description: Vendor part number for the battery.
